verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w substance|strong="G5287"\w* of things hoped \w for|strong="G1679"\w*, the \w evidence|strong="G1650"\w* of \w things|strong="G4229"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w*.
\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G3778"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* obtained a good \w report|strong="G3140"\w*.

Through \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* we \w understand|strong="G3539"\w* \w that|strong="G2675"\w* the \w worlds|strong="G0165"\w* were \w framed|strong="G2675"\w* by the \w word|strong="G4487"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, so \w that|strong="G1519"\w* things which are \w seen|strong="G0991"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* things which do \w appear|strong="G5316"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Abel|strong="G0006"\w* \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G2378"\w* more \w excellent|strong="G4119"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w Cain|strong="G2535"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he obtained \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* that he \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w testifying|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w gifts|strong="G1435"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* he being \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G2980"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Enoch|strong="G1802"\w* was \w translated|strong="G3346"\w* \w that|strong="G3361"\w* he \w should|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w*, \w because|strong="G1360"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w translated|strong="G3346"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w translation|strong="G3331"\w* he had this \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w*, that he \w pleased|strong="G2100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \add it is\add* \w impossible|strong="G0102"\w* to \w please|strong="G2100"\w* \add him\add*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he that \w cometh|strong="G4334"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* he \w is|strong="G1096"\w* a \w rewarder|strong="G3406"\w* of them that diligently \w seek|strong="G1567"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Noah|strong="G3575"\w*, being warned of \w God|strong="G5537"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w things|strong="G0991"\w* \w not|strong="G3369"\w* \w seen|strong="G0991"\w* as \w yet|strong="G3369"\w*, moved with \w fear|strong="G2125"\w*, \w prepared|strong="G2680"\w* an \w ark|strong="G2787"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w saving|strong="G4991"\w* \w of|strong="G3624"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*; \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w condemned|strong="G2632"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w heir|strong="G2818"\w* of the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* which is \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, when he was \w called|strong="G2564"\w* to go \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he should \w after|strong="G3195"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* an \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w*, \w obeyed|strong="G5219"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1987"\w* \w whither|strong="G4226"\w* he \w went|strong="G2064"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* he \w sojourned|strong="G3939"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w land|strong="G1093"\w* of \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add in\add* a strange \w country|strong="G0245"\w*, \w dwelling|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tabernacles|strong="G4633"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*, the heirs with \w him|strong="G4789"\w* of \w the|strong="G1860"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he looked \w for|strong="G1551"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w* which \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w foundations|strong="G2310"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w builder|strong="G5079"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w maker|strong="G1217"\w* \add is\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Through \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sara|strong="G4564"\w* \w herself|strong="G0846"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w strength|strong="G1411"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w conceive|strong="G2602"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was delivered of a \w child|strong="G5088"\w* when she was \w past|strong="G3844"\w* \w age|strong="G2244"\w*, \w because|strong="G1893"\w* she \w judged|strong="G2233"\w* \w him|strong="G1861"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* who had \w promised|strong="G1861"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* sprang \w there|strong="G1080"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G5023"\w* as good as \w dead|strong="G3499"\w*, \add so many\add* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w stars|strong="G0798"\w* of the \w sky|strong="G3772"\w* in \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5616"\w* the \w sand|strong="G0285"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* \w the|strong="G5491"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w shore|strong="G5491"\w* \w innumerable|strong="G0382"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* having \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* having \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* afar \w off|strong="G4207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were persuaded \w of|strong="G3982"\w* \add them\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w embraced|strong="G0782"\w* \add them\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w confessed|strong="G3670"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w were|strong="G1526"\w* \w strangers|strong="G3581"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pilgrims|strong="G3927"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they that \w say|strong="G3004"\w* such \w things|strong="G5108"\w* declare \w plainly|strong="G1718"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w seek|strong="G1934"\w* a \w country|strong="G3968"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w truly|strong="G3303"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they had been \w mindful|strong="G3421"\w* of \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \add country\add* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w whence|strong="G3739"\w* they came \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, they might have \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w opportunity|strong="G2540"\w* to have \w returned|strong="G0344"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* they \w desire|strong="G3713"\w* a \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \add country\add*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, an \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w*: \w wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1870"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ashamed|strong="G1870"\w* to be \w called|strong="G1941"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he hath \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* for \w them|strong="G0846"\w* a \w city|strong="G4172"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, when he was \w tried|strong="G3985"\w*, offered \w up|strong="G4374"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that had \w received|strong="G0324"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w* offered \w up|strong="G4374"\w* his only \w begotten|strong="G3439"\w* \add son\add*,

\w Of|strong="G4314"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* it was \w said|strong="G2980"\w*, \w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \w shall|strong="G2564"\w* \w thy|strong="G4671"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* be \w called|strong="G2564"\w*:

\w Accounting|strong="G3049"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add was\add* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* to \w raise|strong="G1453"\w* \add him\add* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; from \w whence|strong="G3606"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w received|strong="G2865"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w figure|strong="G3850"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Esau|strong="G2269"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* things to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*, when he was a \w dying|strong="G0599"\w*, \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w both|strong="G1538"\w* the \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w*, \add leaning\add* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w top|strong="G0206"\w* \w of|strong="G4464"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w staff|strong="G4464"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, when he \w died|strong="G5053"\w*, made \w mention|strong="G3421"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w departing|strong="G1841"\w* of the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gave \w commandment|strong="G1781"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bones|strong="G3747"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, when he was \w born|strong="G1080"\w*, was \w hid|strong="G2928"\w* three \w months|strong="G5150"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w parents|strong="G3962"\w*, \w because|strong="G1360"\w* they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add he was\add* \w a|strong="G3813"\w* \w proper|strong="G0791"\w* \w child|strong="G3813"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w* \w of|strong="G1297"\w* the \w king’s|strong="G0935"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1297"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, when he was \w come|strong="G1096"\w* to \w years|strong="G3173"\w*, \w refused|strong="G0720"\w* to be \w called|strong="G3004"\w* the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G2364"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="G5328"\w* \w daughter|strong="G2364"\w*;

\w Choosing|strong="G0138"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* to suffer affliction \w with|strong="G4778"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w than|strong="G2228"\w* to \w enjoy|strong="G2192"\w* the \w pleasures|strong="G0619"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* for a \w season|strong="G4340"\w*;

\w Esteeming|strong="G2233"\w* the \w reproach|strong="G3680"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* than the \w treasures|strong="G2344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he had \w respect|strong="G0578"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the recompence of the \w reward|strong="G3405"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* he \w forsook|strong="G2641"\w* \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* the \w wrath|strong="G2372"\w* of the \w king|strong="G0935"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w endured|strong="G2594"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w seeing|strong="G3708"\w* him who is \w invisible|strong="G0517"\w*.

Through \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* he \w kept|strong="G4160"\w* the \w passover|strong="G3957"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sprinkling|strong="G4378"\w* of \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* he that \w destroyed|strong="G3645"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w* should \w touch|strong="G2345"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* they passed \w through|strong="G1224"\w* \w the|strong="G2281"\w* \w Red|strong="G2063"\w* \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w dry|strong="G3584"\w* \add land\add*: \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="G0124"\w* \w assaying|strong="G3984"\w* to \w do|strong="G2983"\w* were \w drowned|strong="G2666"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* the \w walls|strong="G5038"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="G2410"\w* fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w*, after they were \w compassed|strong="G2944"\w* \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

By \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* the \w harlot|strong="G4204"\w* \w Rahab|strong="G4460"\w* \w perished|strong="G4881"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G4881"\w* them that believed \w not|strong="G0544"\w*, when she had \w received|strong="G1209"\w* the \w spies|strong="G2685"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w I|strong="G3004"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* would \w fail|strong="G1952"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* to \w tell|strong="G1334"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w Gedeon|strong="G1066"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \add of\add* \w Barak|strong="G0913"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* \w Samson|strong="G4546"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* \w Jephthae|strong="G2422"\w*; \add of\add* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w also|strong="G5037"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Samuel|strong="G4545"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w subdued|strong="G2610"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="G0932"\w*, \w wrought|strong="G2038"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w obtained|strong="G2013"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*, \w stopped|strong="G5420"\w* the \w mouths|strong="G4750"\w* of \w lions|strong="G3023"\w*,

\w Quenched|strong="G4570"\w* the \w violence|strong="G1411"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w escaped|strong="G5343"\w* the \w edge|strong="G4750"\w* of the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*, out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w weakness|strong="G0769"\w* were made \w strong|strong="G1743"\w*, \w waxed|strong="G1096"\w* \w valiant|strong="G2478"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fight|strong="G4171"\w*, turned to \w flight|strong="G2827"\w* the \w armies|strong="G3925"\w* of the \w aliens|strong="G0245"\w*.

\w Women|strong="G1135"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* raised to life \w again|strong="G0386"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w others|strong="G0243"\w* were \w tortured|strong="G5178"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w accepting|strong="G4327"\w* \w deliverance|strong="G0629"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w obtain|strong="G5177"\w* \w a|strong="G0386"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w had|strong="G2983"\w* \w trial|strong="G3984"\w* \w of|strong="G1701"\w* \add cruel\add* \w mockings|strong="G1701"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w scourgings|strong="G3148"\w*, \w yea|strong="G2089"\w*, \w moreover|strong="G1161"\w* of \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w imprisonment|strong="G5438"\w*:

They were \w stoned|strong="G3034"\w*, they were sawn \w asunder|strong="G4249"\w*, were \w tempted|strong="G3985"\w*, were \w slain|strong="G0599"\w* with the \w sword|strong="G3162"\w*: they wandered \w about|strong="G4022"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w sheepskins|strong="G3374"\w* \w and|strong="G1722"\w* \w goat|strong="G0122"\w*\w skins|strong="G1192"\w*; being \w destitute|strong="G5302"\w*, \w afflicted|strong="G2346"\w*, \w tormented|strong="G2558"\w*;

(Of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w*:) they \w wandered|strong="G4105"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w deserts|strong="G2047"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* \w dens|strong="G4693"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w caves|strong="G3692"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

And \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, having obtained a good \w report|strong="G3140"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w received|strong="G2865"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*:

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* having \w provided|strong="G4265"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w should|strong="G5048"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be made \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*.
